item.title: Dueling Blockchain Visions Face Off in Consensus 2016 Finale - CoinDesk
item.description:
Dueling Blockchain Visions Face Off in Consensus 2016 Finale - CoinDesk

The final panel on the last full day of Consensus 2016 featured a gentlemen's dual of philosophies over the merits of public and private blockchains by two of the biggest names in the business.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 05/04/2016 - Short-Term Symmetrical Triangle - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 05/04/2016 - Short-Term Symmetrical Triangle - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price is moving inside a symmetrical triangle consolidation pattern and is hovering around the top of the formation. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price is moving inside a symmetrical triangle consolidation pattern and is hovering around the top of the formation.

item.title: Ethereum Can Solve The Internet of Thing's Problems
item.description:
Ethereum Can Solve The Internet of Thing's Problems

Ethereum is a platform that offers many benefits for the Internet of Things, smart contracts and low confirmation times can solve some of the challenges ahead of IoT deployments: security and scalability. The Internet of Things (IoT) in its broader definition, is the interconnection of many heterogeneous devices -ranging from desktop computers, embedded systems, small sensors, among others-.

item.title: Anyone Could Have Invented Bitcoin
item.description:
Anyone Could Have Invented Bitcoin

According to modern mythmaking, a mysterious and reclusive programmer invented Bitcoin in 2008 and within five years the currency had transformed itself from a valueless experiment into a half-billion dollar juggernaut-the most impressive economic explosion in the history of humanity. It was shocking, inexplicable, and entirely without precedent.

item.title: The battle over the future of bitcoin
item.description:
The battle over the future of bitcoin

The bitcoin world this week learned its absentee father might be Craig Wright, an Australian entrepreneur with nice suits and well-combed hair who claims he invented the digital currency. Wright's appearance complicates an already vicious custody battle.

item.title: Valyrian Tech Presents Bitcoin Spellbook Project
item.description:
Valyrian Tech Presents Bitcoin Spellbook Project

Bitcoin blockchain development is an area worth exploring by all kinds of developers, and the Bitcoin Spellbook v0.1 wants to make that process a lot more approachable. Don't expect any pointy hats and wand-waving, though, as this project is all about combining APIs and web services using the Bitcoin blockchain to create new applications and tools.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on this Morning - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on this Morning - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking at in the bitcoin price this morning. After yesterday's steep decline in the bitcoin price, we got a period of drawn out consolidation thorughout Monday afternoon and early evening. The consolidation came about as a result of profit-taking on the short side, and likely, some counter positions being taken in anticipation of a long-term reversal.

item.title: Derivatives Leader CME Announces Bitcoin Benchmark Rates; NYSE to Follow
item.description:
Derivatives Leader CME Announces Bitcoin Benchmark Rates; NYSE to Follow

In a major move that is undoubtedly going to benefit and bring credibility to bitcoin and digital currencies, derivatives giant CME Group has announced the launch of two bitcoin benchmarks as its newest products. CME Group rival ICE (Intercontinental Exchange Inc) which owns the New York Stock Exchange, will also launch a real-time price index for bitcoin price.

item.title: Andresen Denies Hacking as GitHub Access Limited - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Andresen Denies Hacking as GitHub Access Limited - Bitcoin News

Amid speculation surrounding Dr. Craig Wright's claim to be Satoshi Nakamoto, Core developer Gavin Andresen has lost his Bitcoin commit privileges on GitHub. Also read: Industry Heavy Hitters Reveal the 'Real Satoshi' Andresen earlier released a blog entry stating his belief that Wright is the man behind the Satoshi Nakamoto pseudonym, which caused immediate controversy, with many suspecting Andresen had been hacked.

item.title: IPayYou Bitcoin Wallet Lets Users Cancel Transactions
item.description:
IPayYou Bitcoin Wallet Lets Users Cancel Transactions

Although these two features are appealing in their own right, the company plans to bring other types of functionality to IPayYou in the coming months. Bitcoin wallet solutions are plentiful, but there is still a mental hurdle to overcome by novice users.
